title: Can Men wear Jeans or Pants? - Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: a Brahmin says can men wear jeans wearing jeans and wearing trousers in general for men is permissible but the more it is loose and not tight and not exposing there are the better it is but even if it is tight it is permissible because the outer of a man is nothing close to the outer of a woman so a man must try his level best not to wear something that is extremely tight and fitting his body and Allah knows best
